HOME.EXPLANATION: Hello, this site is a place to create and apply interesting ideas I might have and help me practice new technologies I'm studying.
HOME.SEND_OFF: Feel free to look around and checkout my projects!

PROJECTS.DEV: These are projects still in development:

EMOJI.TITLE: Emoji Guessing Game
EMOJI.DESC: Try to find out what pop culture meaning these emoji represent!

SCHEDULER.TITLE: Group Scheduler
SCHEDULER.DESC:
Trying to arrange the best time and date for a group meeting but have trouble getting everyone's best availabe date?
Try my group scheduler!
